skill.name: Protector of the Streets
skill.value: Restores 1776/2256 HP to 2 allies (melee priority). Targets receive 45%/57% less DMG for a limited time.

ability.name: The Samurai of Shinsengumi (Lv. 53)
ability.value: Increases own level by 13 when another member of the Shinsengumi is on the team.
